Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19340924]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=12.5 µM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=25 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:19340924]LD50>100 µg/ml against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Temporin-LT1 shows hemolytic activities against rabbit red blood cells (LD50>100 µg/ml).

Literature.Title: Isolation, characterization and molecular cloning of new antimicrobial peptides belonging to the brevinin-1 and temporin families from the skin of Hylarana latouchii (Anura Ranidae).
Literature.Author: Wang H, Yan X, Yu H, Hu Y, Yu Z, Zheng H, Chen Z, Zhang Z, Liu J.
